name: PertussisTestPanelsForBordetellaPertussisAndBordetellaParapertussisNucleicAcidAndCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Pertussis (Test Panels for Bordetella pertussis and Bordetella parapertussis Nucleic Acid and Culture and Identification Method)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Bordetella pertussis Bordetella parapertussis nucleic acid and culture),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Test Panels for Bordetella pertussis and Bordetella parapertussis nucleic acid and culture;  

LOINC search: “bordetella (culture or isolate or nucleic) panel -donor -interpretation”),(Exclusion Criteria: Respiratory panel e.g. Biofire Assay)
